00261    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::PairPotentialImpl(Simulation& simulation)
00262     : PairPotential(simulation),
00263       interactionPtr_(0),
00264       methodId_(0)

00278    * Destructor. 
00279    */
00280    template <class Interaction>
00281    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::~PairPotentialImpl() 
00282    {
00283       if (interactionPtr_) {
00284          delete interactionPtr_;
00285          interactionPtr_ = 0;
00286       }
00287    }

00296    template <class Interaction>
00297    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00298    {
00299       readBegin(in,"PairPotential");
00300       bool nextIndent = false;
00301       readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00302       readPairListParam(in);
00303       readEnd(in);
00304    }

00318                                         int iAtomType, int jAtomType) const
00319    { return interaction().energy(rsq, iAtomType, jAtomType); }

00325    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::forceOverR(double rsq, 
00326                                         int iAtomType, int jAtomType) const
00327    { return interaction().forceOverR(rsq, iAtomType, jAtomType); }

00343    /*
00344    * Increment atomic forces, without calculating energy.
00345    */
00346    template <class Interaction>
00347    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces()
00348    {  
00349        stamp(PairPotential::START);
00350        if (methodId_ == 0) {
00351           addForcesList(); 
00352        } else
00353        if (methodId_ == 1) {
00354           addForcesCell(); 
00355        } else {
00356           addForcesNSq(); 
00357        }
00358        stamp(PairPotential::FORCES);
00359    }
00360 
00361    /*
00362    * Compute total pair energy on all processors.
00363    */
00364    template <class Interaction>
00365    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00366    void 
00367    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00368    #else
00369    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy()
00370    #endif
00371    { 
00372       double localEnergy = 0; 
00373       if (methodId_ == 0) {
00374          localEnergy = energyList(); 
00375       } else 
00376       if (methodId_ == 1) {
00377          localEnergy = energyCell(); 
00378       } else {
00379          localEnergy = energyNSq(); 
00380       }
00381 
00382       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00383       communicator.Reduce(&localEnergy, &energy_, 1, 
00384                           MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00385       #else
00386       energy_ = localEnergy;
00387       #endif
00388    }
00389 
00390    /*
00391    * Return total pair energy from all processors.
00392    */
00393    template <class Interaction>
00394    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energy()
00395    {  return energy_; } 
00396 
00397    /*
00398    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00399    */
00400    template <class Interaction>
00401    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energyList()
00402    {
00403       Vector f;
00404       double rsq;
00405       double energy = 0.0;
00406       PairIterator iter;
00407       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00408       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00409       int    type0, type1;
00410       for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00411          iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00412          type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00413          type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00414          f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00415          rsq = f.square();
00416          if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00417             energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00418          } else {
00419             energy += 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00420          }
00421       }
00422       return energy;
00423    }
00424 
00425 
00426    /*
00427    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00428    */
00429    template <class Interaction>
00430    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForcesList()
00431    {
00432       Vector f;
00433       double rsq;
00434       PairIterator iter;
00435       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00436       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00437       int    type0, type1;
00438       for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00439          iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00440          f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00441          rsq = f.square();
00442          type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00443          type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00444          f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00445          atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00446          if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00447             atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00448          }
00449       }
00450    }
00451 
00452    /*
00453    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00454    */
00455    template <class Interaction>
00456    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energyCell()
00457    {
00458       // Find all neighbors (cell list)
00459       Cell::NeighborArray neighbors;
00460       Vector f;
00461       double rsq;
00462       double energy = 0.0;
00463       Atom*  atomPtr0;
00464       Atom*  atomPtr1;
00465       const Cell*  cellPtr;
00466       int    type0, type1, na, nn, i, j;
00467 
00468       // Iterate over linked list of local cells.
00469       cellPtr = cellList_.begin();
00470       while (cellPtr) {
00471          cellPtr->getNeighbors(neighbors);
00472          na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00473          nn = neighbors.size();
00474          for (i = 0; i < na; ++i) {
00475             atomPtr0 = neighbors[i];
00476             type0 = atomPtr0->typeId();
00477             // Loop over atoms in this cell
00478             for (j = 0; j < na; ++j) {
00479                atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00480                type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00481                if (atomPtr1 > atomPtr0) {
00482                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00483                   rsq = f.square();
00484                   energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00485                }
00486             }
00487             // Loop over atoms in neighboring cells.
00488             for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00489                atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00490                type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00491                f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00492                rsq = f.square();
00493                if (!atomPtr1->isGhost()) {
00494                   energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00495                } else {
00496                   energy += 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00497                }
00498             }
00499          }
00500          cellPtr = cellPtr->nextCellPtr();
00501       } // while (cellPtr) 
00502       return energy;
00503    }
00504 
00505    /*
00506    * Increment atomic forces using Cell List (private).
00507    */
00508    template <class Interaction>
00509    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForcesCell()
00510    {
00511       // Find all neighbors (cell list)
00512       Cell::NeighborArray neighbors;
00513       Vector f;
00514       double rsq;
00515       Atom*  atomPtr0;
00516       Atom*  atomPtr1;
00517       const Cell* cellPtr;
00518       int    type0, type1, na, nn, i, j;
00519 
00520       // Iterate over local cells.
00521       cellPtr = cellList_.begin();
00522       while (cellPtr) {
00523          cellPtr->getNeighbors(neighbors);
00524          na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00525          nn = neighbors.size();
00526          for (i = 0; i < na; ++i) {
00527             atomPtr0 = neighbors[i];
00528             type0 = atomPtr0->typeId();
00529             // Loop over atoms in this cell
00530             for (j = 0; j < na; ++j) {
00531                atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00532                type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00533                if (atomPtr1 > atomPtr0) {
00534                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00535                   rsq = f.square();
00536                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00537                   atomPtr0->force() += f;
00538                   atomPtr1->force() -= f;
00539                }
00540             }
00541             // Loop over atoms in neighboring cells.
00542             for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00543                atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00544                type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00545                f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00546                rsq = f.square();
00547                f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00548                atomPtr0->force() += f;
00549                if (!atomPtr1->isGhost()) {
00550                   atomPtr1->force() -= f;
00551                }
00552             }
00553          }
00554          cellPtr = cellPtr->nextCellPtr();
00555       } // while (cellPtr) 
00556    }

00558    /*
00559    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00560    */
00561    template <class Interaction>
00562    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energyNSq()
00563    {
00564       Vector f;
00565       double rsq;
00566       double energy = 0.0;
00567       AtomIterator  atomIter0, atomIter1;
00568       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00569       int           type0, type1;
00570 
00571       // Iterate over local atom 0
00572       storage().begin(atomIter0);
00573       for ( ; atomIter0.notEnd(); ++atomIter0) {
00574          type0 = atomIter0->typeId();
00575          // Iterate over local atom 1
00576          storage().begin(atomIter1);
00577          for ( ; atomIter1.notEnd(); ++atomIter1) {
00578             type1 = atomIter1->typeId();
00579             if (atomIter0->id() < atomIter1->id()) {
00580                f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), atomIter1->position());
00581                rsq = f.square();
00582                energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00583             }
00584          }
00585          // Iterate over ghost atoms
00586          storage().begin(ghostIter);
00587          for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00588             type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00589             f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00590             rsq = f.square();
00591             energy += 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00592          }
00593       }
00594       return energy;
00595    }
00596 
00597    /*
00598    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00599    */
00600    template <class Interaction>
00601    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForcesNSq()
00602    {
00603       Vector f;
00604       double rsq;
00605       AtomIterator  atomIter0, atomIter1;
00606       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00607       int           type0, type1, id0, id1;
00608 
00609       // Iterate over atom 0
00610       storage().begin(atomIter0);
00611       for ( ; atomIter0.notEnd(); ++atomIter0) {
00612          id0 = atomIter0->id();
00613          type0 = atomIter0->typeId();
00614 
00615          // Iterate over atom 1
00616          storage().begin(atomIter1);
00617          for ( ; atomIter1.notEnd(); ++atomIter1) {
00618             type1 = atomIter1->typeId();
00619             id1 =   atomIter1->id();
00620             if (id0 < id1) {
00621                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00622                   // Set f = r0 - r1, separation between atoms
00623                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), atomIter1->position());
00624                   rsq = f.square();
00625                   // Set vector force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00626                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00627                   atomIter0->force() += f;
00628                   atomIter1->force() -= f;
00629                }
00630             }
00631          }
00632 
00633          // Iterate over ghosts
00634          storage().begin(ghostIter);
00635          for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00636             id1 = ghostIter->id();
00637             type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00638             if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00639                // Set f = r0 - r1, separation between atoms
00640                f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00641                rsq = f.square();
00642                // force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00643                f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00644                atomIter0->force() += f;
00645             }
00646          }
00647 
00648       }
00649    }

00652    /* 
00653    * Add nonBonded pair forces to atomic forces.
00654    */
00655    template <class Interaction>
00656    template <typename T>
00657    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStressImpl(T& stress) const
00658    {
00659 
00660       Vector       dr;
00661       Vector       force;
00662       double       rsq;
00663       PairIterator iter;
00664       Atom        *atom1Ptr;
00665       Atom        *atom0Ptr;
00666 
00667       setToZero(stress);
00668 
00669       // Loop over nonbonded neighbor pairs
00670       for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00671          iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00672          rsq = boundary().
00673                distanceSq(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position(), dr);
00674          force  = dr;
00675          force *= interaction().
00676                   forceOverR(rsq, atom0Ptr->typeId(), atom1Ptr->typeId());
00677          incrementPairStress(force, dr, stress);
00678       }
00679 
00680       // Normalize by volume 
00681       stress /= boundary().volume();
00682       normalizeStress(stress);
00683 
00684    }
